name: ConceptDraw DIAGRAM Template
summary: A CDTZ file is a diagram template created by CS Odessa ConceptDraw DIAGRAM, a diagramming application for Windows and macOS. It contains a diagram, similar to a .CDDZ file, which may include text, preset shapes, lines, symbols, and images. ConceptDraw DIAGRAM users save diagrams as CDTZ templates to store diagrams with content and designs they want to replicate.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
